function.name: take_screenshot
function.description: function to capture content of a webpage in a screenshot.

function.name: load_page
function.description: function to navigate to a webpage using a URL.

url.description: URL of the webpage to navigate to.

function.name: move_cursor
function.description: function to move the cursor relative to its current position using relative x and y values.

function.name: end_conversation
function.description: function to end the current conversation once the predefined objectives are complete.
